name: AvatarRoot
description:
Displays a user's profile picture, initials, or fallback icon. Renders a <span> element.

Documentation: [Avatar Documentation](https://vapor-ui.goorm.io/docs/components/avatar)

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: alt
props.description: Alternative text description of the avatar image.

props.name: shape
props.description: Use the shape prop to change the shape of the avatar

props.name: src
props.description: The image URL for the avatar. If the image fails to load, the fallback will be displayed.

props.name: size
props.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the avatar

props.name: render
type: ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps<any>, State> & ReactElement<Record<string, unknown>, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: delay
props.description: How long to wait before showing the fallback. Specified in milliseconds.
